original_title: Don Omar: King of Kings Live
overview: One of the most successful artists to come out of the burgeoning reggaeton scene is Don Omar, who struts his stuff in this 2006 performance of his Grammy-nominated album "King of Kings." The Puerto Rican musician delights fans at his country's José Miguel Agrelot Coliseum with renditions of hits such as "Conteo" and "Los Bandoleros" (both on The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift soundtrack).
title: Don Omar: King of Kings Live
